frameDefinitions: The Temperature in a certain environment, determined by Time and Place, is specified.
In this frame, an Agent changes the temperature of an Item.
While in motion, an Impactor makes sudden, forcible contact with the Impactee, or two Impactors both move, mutually making forcible contact.
A Cook applies heat to Food, where the Temperature_setting of the heat and Duration of application may be specified.
An Entity has a Temperature characterized by the target.
This frame contains words referring to teaching and the participants in teaching.
frameExamples: It's too <t>hot</t> to do anything today.
Margaret Anne <t>chilled</t> the salad to 30 degrees.
The massive metal foot <t>hit</t> the ground with a huge thud.
The pan is already too <t>hot</t> to touch.
Dad <t>taught</t> me that if you work hard, you will be OK - no matter what happens.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Place</fen> where  it is a certain <fen>Temperature</fen> .
The temperature feature of the weather.
A quantity or other characterization of the <fen>Temperature</fen> of the environment.
A modifier expressing  the deviation of the <fen>Temperature</fen> from the norm.
The <fen>Time</fen> during which an ambient environment has a particular <fen>Temperature</fen>.
The meteorological conditions which determine the ambient temperature of a locale.
The <fen>Agent</fen> performs the intentional act which changes the temperature of the <fen>Item</fen>.
The <fen>Item</fen> undergoes the temperature change.
An animate or inanimate entity, a force, or event that changes the temperature. Volitionality is not a necessary characteristic of <fen>Cause</fen>s.
The <fen>Hot_Cold_source</fen> is the source of the heat or coolness.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when  the <fen>Agent</fen> changes the temperature of the <fen>Item</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where  the <fen>Agent</fen> changes the temperature of the <fen>Item</fen>.
The entity that hits the <fen>Impactee</fen>.
The entity which is hit by the <fen>Impactor</fen>.
The multiple entities that collide.
When the event occurs.
Where the event takes place.
The <fen>Cook</fen> applies heat to the <fen>Food</fen>.
This role identifes the entity that  directly supplies heat to the <fen>Food</fen>.
<fen>Food</fen> is the entity to which heat is applied by the <fen>Cook</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Temperature_setting</fen> of the <fen>Heating_instrument</fen> for the <fen>Food</fen>.
The <fen>Container</fen> holds the <fen>Food</fen> to which heat is applied.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> at which the heat application occurs.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the heat application  occurs.
The <fen>Entity</fen> for which the temperature <fen>Attribute</fen> is under consideration.
The feature of an <fen>Entity</fen> which is under discussion.
A quantity or other characterization of the <fen>Entity</fen>'s state with respect to the temperature <fen>Attribute</fen>.
A modifier expressing  the deviation of the <fen>Temperature</fen> from the norm.
The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Entity</fen> is in the state of having  a particular <fen>Degree</fen> for the temperature <fen>Attribute</fen>.
One who instructs a <fen>Student</fen> in some area of knowledge or skill.
One who is instructed by a <fen>Teacher</fen> in skills or knowledge.
An educational establishment, such as a school or college.
The area of knowledge or skill which is taught by a <fen>Teacher</fen> or to a <fen>Student</fen>.
A formal Qualification such as an academic degree or a certificate for which a student is aiming.
An action which the <fen>Student</fen> is able to perform as a result of instruction.
A guideline for correct behavior. In most cases, this concerns morally or socially desirable actions.
A piece of information that the <fen>Student</fen> is informed of by the <fen>Teacher</fen>.
Educational <fen>Material</fen>, such as books, tapes, or videos, used by a <fen>Teacher</fen> or a <fen>Student</fen> to acquire skills or knowledge.
A role, typically professional or vocational,  that the <fen>Student</fen> is meant to be able to fill as a result of their training.
FN: a program of lectures or other matter dealing with a subject
The time when the teaching occurs.

The <fen>Place</fen> is the location within which the teaching takes place.

Consider whether a possible <fen>Place</fen> phrase is really where the training took place or is rather part of a description of the <fen>Institution</fen>.
listRoleExamples: <fex>Chicago</fex> is  hot today .
The temperature  was <fex>85 F</fex> in the shade today
It's like <fex>totally</fex> chilly, dude, like, totally.
We get warmer <fex>weather</fex> this time of year.
<fex>Ryan</fex> reheated the pasta in the microwave.
Ryan reheated <fex>the pasta</fex> in the microwave.
<fex>The sun</fex> warmed the house.
We chilled the drinks <fex>on ice</fex>.
<fex>The rock</fex> hit the sand with a thump.
The rock hit <fex>the sand</fex> with a thump.
<fex>The car and truck</fex> collided at a combined speed of over 100MPH.
<fex>Drew</fex> sauteed the garlic in butter.
Jim browned the roast <fex>in the oven</fex>.
Suzy usually steams <fex>the broccoli</fex>.
He baked the cookies <fex>at 350 degrees</fex> for 11 minutes.
Boil the potatoes <fex>in a medium-sized pan</fex>.
Jim roasted the chestnuts <fex>in the evening</fex>.
We baked the cake <fex>in the kitchen</fex>.
<fex>The soup</fex>'s too hot.
The skillet had a temperature <fex>of 230 F</fex>
She's a <fex>French</fex> Teacher
She's Studying <fex>for a Master's degree</fex>
Taut with worry, Dad taught us <fex>how to drive</fex>.
My brother taught me <fex>not to be mean to guys when I'm not interested in them</fex>.
When I was two she taught me <fex>that a quarter was 25 cents and a dime was 10 cents</fex>.
All employees have received <fex>a booklet</fex> INSTRUCTING them on how to report ` anything from unwanted touching and uncalled-for blue jokes to overt demands for sexual favours . '
When his father died he went to live with an uncle in Ka'u who trained him <fex>as a warrior</fex> during his teenage years
